Comparison with other news stations: The expert compared the claim that NJN is the only news station covering New Jersey government with the existence of other news stations that also provide news coverage of New Jersey government. This comparison revealed that there are indeed other stations that cover New Jersey government, such as My9 News and News 12 New Jersey.
Examination of news sources: The expert examined the sources of news stories about New Jersey government and found that they were not solely limited to NJN. The expert found stories about New Jersey government on the websites of television stations based in the New York and Philadelphia areas, indicating that NJN is not the only source of news on this topic.
Expert opinion: The expert cited Lawrence Londino, chair of the Department of Broadcasting at Montclair State University, who stated that NJN is not the only game in town when it comes to news coverage of New Jersey. This expert opinion further supports the conclusion that NJN is not the only news station covering New Jersey government.
Acknowledgment by the claimant: The expert mentioned that Sen. Loretta Weinberg, who made the claim, acknowledged in a phone interview that other stations provide news coverage. This acknowledgment indicates that the claimant herself recognized that NJN is not the only news station covering New Jersey government.
